TopicTitle: Decoupled parts are still part of the ship.

Articles.Content:
As revolutionary as this new RC technology is, it's hard to control your ship when one part of it is here, "the other part of it" is there, and the COM and camera are halfway in between. Recently installed Stockalike Mining Extension and Mk 2 Expansion, which in turn comes with Interstellar Fuel Switch and Community Resource Pack, so that might be it. Other Mods:

  • Community Tech Tree
  • Distant Object Enchancement
  • EVE
  • Firespitter (plugins only)
  • KAS
  • Kerbal Engineer
  • Hyper Edit
  • KIS
  • Infernal Robotics
  • Mech Jeb
  • Kerbal Planetary Base System
  • PlanetShine
  • Texture Replacer
  • KAC

It appears to have something to do with SOI changes, since everything is fine at Kerbin, but as soon as I go to Minmus it stops working

EDIT: Also seems to only happen with the 3.5 meter decouplers

Edited July 3, 2016 by Brownhair2

Happened again. This time with a docking port.

Edited July 11, 2016 by Brownhair2
